posts.body:
>>cb42250b-cca5-4546-acd5-1d4824d241ff
HW became irrelevant when he left 8chan.  It's literally the only thing he's done in his life, and he'll be remembered for it, but that doesn't mean that it automatically makes him some kind of authority.

>Beat Saber, Synth Riders
I have a VR headset, so I feel obligated to use it.  Those are the only games I can go back to. 
>FFXIV
My friends keep playing this, but I don't really get it.  It's not horrible, just feels slow as molasses.
>Deep Rock Galactic
Relaxing FPS action that's not PvP
>Akane
Fun little action game, AA+++++ would kill cyberpunk enemies with a Katana again.
>Senran Kagura: Peach Ball (Switch)
Fuck you I'll do what I want to.

>>9a0d8cb8-9d65-4f21-946f-1b5d61e22e84
It's pretty comfy here, but seems pretty dead.
Whatever happened to that browser extension that allowed you to hide messages in images on an imageboard?  lainchan used to have a board for that extension

>>b4f01c2f-c044-4382-96aa-c635611f5e0e
then do it, no one's stopping you.  just make sure you don't have aids.

posts.subject: Feature Request
posts.body:
I'd like to be able to select multiple threads from the catalog, and then mute the OP of all of them at once in the same operation. 

Since we need to handle spam filtering on our own because distributed, then tools to help manage that are needed.

>>494ca692-7aae-4b32-a56b-e29943768255
Divinity Original Sin (first game), Pillars of Eternity

>>33c9151d-e0b7-4b0e-aef1-c46945c3dd14
the board software needs to allow you to multi-select threads and ban the OP of those threads, would that work?

>>6fcdc448-4d6d-4f6d-a856-47ebc8a7da85
there used to be a functional browser addon that streamlined it

i think this was it https://github.com/desudesutalk/desudesutalk

lainchan still has a board that was dedicated to it, but most of the comments were variations on "neat"  https://www.lainchan.org/layer/
